description: This Dart source file manages transaction data in a Flutter application, including state management, fetching transaction lists and details, and handling create/update/delete operations via HTTP API calls. It defines classes for state representation and notify management using Riverpod.

classes.name: TransactionsListState
classes.description: Holds state for a list of transactions, including loading status and error info.

classes.name: TransactionCrudState
classes.description: Represents the state during create, update, delete operations for transactions.

classes.name: TransactionCrudNotifier
classes.description: Manages CRUD operations for transactions, updating the state accordingly.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the state with optional new values, supporting immutability.

methods.name: initial
methods.description: Provides an initial state with default values.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new transaction via POST request, updating state based on success or failure.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing transaction via PUT request, updating state accordingly.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a transaction via DELETE request, updating state on success or failure.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the CRUD state to initial defaults.
